title: Tasty Dry Roasted Chicken ( Chicken Peratal ) Recipe
content:
A super delicious chicken dish that not only tastes really delicious. But is very easy to make too. This goes great with rice, rasam or curd rice.

When I was looking for dinner inspiration online, I came across a picture of a spicy chicken curry served with some naan. I got so inspired by that so I made it almost immediately.

 

Chicken Peratal Recipe

Prep time: 5 mins

Cook time: 35 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Coconut Oil - ¼ cup

Shallots / Sambar Onion - 10 to 15

Coconut - ¼ cup grated

Garam Masala Powder - 1 teaspoon

Coriander leaves - a handful finely chopped

Lemon Juice - to taste

 

FOR MARINATION:

Chicken - 500 grams

Ginger - 1 tablespoon chopped finely

Garlic - 2 tablespoons chopped finely

Onion - 1 large sliced thinly

Curry leaves - 1 sprig

Curd - ¼ cup

Salt to taste

 

FOR ROASTING:

Kashmiri Chilli powder - 1 tablespoon

Chilli powder - 2 teaspoons

Turmeric Powder - ½ teaspoon

Coriander Powder - 1 tablespoon

 

Instructions

Dry roast spice powders for 2 mins. Take it in a bowl with onions and mix well. Add all the ingredients and mix well. Leave aside for 20 mins.

Take it in a pan, mix well. Cover with a lid and cook on low heat for 20 mins.

Now add in oil and mix well. Add in shallots and mix well.

Cook till the chicken is well browned.

Add in coconut, garam masala and mix well.

Add in coriander leaves and lemon juice and mix well.

Serve it.
